statements: DELETE FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND communication_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE customer_id = 123 AND communication_type = 'Email';
DELETE FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE communication_date <= '2021-06-30' OR communication_type = 'Phone';
DELETE FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND customer_id = 203;
DELETE FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE customer_id = 101 AND communication_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CustomerDetails WHERE loan_amount > 50000 AND customer_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith' AND communication_date = '2022-01-01';
